updated_cases.title: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic via IPsec w/ Hitting Tenant Exception List
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic via IPsec w/ Hitting Tenant Exception List
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Make sure URL is in domain_fronting.json 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Make sure URL is in {list-id}.json
(/opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
6. Send HTTPRequest via IPsec (SNI and host mismatch)
7. Hitting the exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked

updated_cases.title: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic match SSL Bypass Policy w/o Hitting Tenant Exception List
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Domain Fronting Traffic match SSL Bypass Policy w/o Hitting Tenant Exception List
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Make sure the testing URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Make sure the testing URL is not in domain_fronting.json 
5. Adding the testing URL to the SSL Bypass Policy
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
6. Make sure URL is in {list-id}.json
(/opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
7. Send HTTP/2 Request (SNI and host mismatch)
8. Didn't hit the exception list
9. Traffic should not be blocked

updated_cases.title: Restart the Proxy and Check Per Tenant Domain Fronting Exception List Feature Again
updated_cases.custom_summary: Restart the Proxy and Check Per Tenant Domain Fronting Exception List Feature Again
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Make sure URL is in domain_fronting.json 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Make sure URL is in {list-id}.json
(/opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
6. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
7. Hitting the exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked
9. Restart the NSproxy
10. Resend HTTPRequest and check the traffic again

updated_cases.title: Removing Exception List After the Traffic Hit the List and Pass Through the Proxy (ENG-196823)
updated_cases.custom_summary: Removing Exception List After the Traffic Hit the List and Pass Through the Proxy (ENG-196823)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Make sure URL is in domain_fronting.json 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Make sure URL is in {list-id}.json
(/opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
# The order of step 3 and 4 is not confirm yet.
6. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
7. Hitting the exception list
8. Traffic should not be block
9. Remove the exception list as ENG-196823
10. Traffic should be blocked

updated_cases.title: Sending Bypass Traffic to Check Transaction Event with Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Bypass Traffic to Check Transaction Event with Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host match)
4. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be "Bypass"
5. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be "Domain Fronting Detected"
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be "Bypass"
2. "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be "Domain Fronting Detected"
